Audio Description: A black and gray torpedo bursts through this poster from the upper right to the lower left corner. Surrounding the torpedo are streaks of white, pink and gray suggesting movement and speed. Behind this image, in a checkerboard pattern are four squares, two of them are pale blue with the torpedo running through them. The upper left square contains black and white photographs of a destroyer racing through the water and torpedo hits on vessels. The square in the lower right corner contains black and white photographs of workers preparing torpedoes in munitions plants. In a large red band at the bottom of the poster, in large white letters, are the words “Torpedo the Axis!”
Creator: Great Britain. Royal Navy

Title: Torpedo the Axis!
